statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir_parts=$(echo "$current_dir" | tr '/' '\n' | tail -2 | tr '\n' '/' | sed 's/\/$//'); if [ "$dir_parts" != "$current_dir" ]; then dir_display="â€¦/$dir_parts"; else dir_display="$current_dir"; fi; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git -C "$current_dir" status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then git_info=" $branch*"; else git_info=" $branch"; fi; else git_info=''; fi; printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m%s \033[90m%s\033[0m" "$dir_display" "$git_info" "$model"
